Field.DisplayName: Pre-conversion time zone start time [hour] - 変換前時間帯開始時刻[hour]
Field.Description: Start time of the time zone to be converted to cutscene time [hour] - カットシーン時刻に変換する時間帯の開始時刻[hour]

Field.DisplayName: Cutscene time after conversion [hour] - 変換後カットシーン時刻[hour]
Field.Description: Enter the time used during cutscene playback in hours [hour] - カットシーン再生中に使われる時刻を時間単位で入力[hour]
